short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Awakened Life is a curated collection of images and quotes designed as a simple way to pause and reflect.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When creating a new tab, you are welcomed daily with reflective images and quotes to give you a moment of pause. This free extension is rooted in living a life with greater love, intention, and gratitude.
